00001 /* File geometries.h begun by BLFoley on 20080606
00002    Purpose: structures related to geometries of molecules,
00003         residues, atoms, etc.  
00004    NOTE!!!  This file is loaded with the molecules.h header file by default.
00005         It should only be loaded explicitly in a program if, for some reason,
00006         you are using it separately. */
00007 #if !defined(GLYLIB_GEOMETRIES)
00008 #define GLYLIB_GEOMETRIES
00009 typedef struct {
00010         double i,j,k; 
00011 } coord_3D; // cartesian, polar, direction cosines, etc.
00012 
00013 typedef struct {
00014         double i,j,k,d; // i,j,k vector with magnitude d
00015 } vectormag_3D; // same as "plane" but with easier naming
00016 
00017 typedef struct {
00018         double A,B,C,D;
00019 } plane; // standard plane, Ax+By+Cz+D=0
00020 #endif
